mozambique 0.0.0.9000

Mozambique populated places locations

Source: R/data.R
ppl.Rd

Mozambique populated places locations

ppl

Format

A sf object containing populated places locations of Mozambique

| Variables | Description | | osm_id | OpenStreetMap identifier | | name | Name of populated place | | source | Source of data for populated place | | population | Population size | | is_in | Populated place is in? | | place | Type of place |

Source

https://data.humdata.org/dataset/hotosm_moz_populated_places

Examples

ppl
#> Simple feature collection with 2530 features and 6 fields
#> Geometry type: GEOMETRY
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 30.21953 ymin: -26.86414 xmax: 40.83467 ymax: -10.59017
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#> First 10 features:
#>       osm_id   place source population          name               is_in
#> 1   27564983    city   <NA>     675422        Matola                <NA>
#> 2   27565081    city   <NA>    1244227        Maputo                <NA>
#> 3  243840100  hamlet   <NA>       <NA>       Catembe          Mocambique
#> 4  259593578    city   <NA>     436240         Beira                <NA>
#> 5  259593870    city   <NA>     192876     Quelimane                <NA>
#> 6  266982648    town   <NA>       <NA> Ponta do Ouro                <NA>
#> 7  274308698 village   <NA>       <NA>     Biri Biri          Mozambique
#> 8  277269080 village   <NA>       <NA>        Lizulu              Malawi
#> 9  286002566 village   <NA>       <NA> Fort Mlangeni              Malawi
